context.introduction: Master the art of cooking pasta to perfection. Learn about al dente texture, water salting, and common mistakes.

sections.title: Al Dente: The Perfect Bite
sections.content: Pasta should be cooked al dente, meaning firm to the bite, for the best texture and flavor.

sections.title: Salting the Water
sections.content: Properly salted water is essential for flavorful pasta. Use about 1 tablespoon of salt per 4 liters of water.

sections.title: Common Mistakes
sections.content: Avoid adding oil to pasta water, as it prevents sauce from sticking.
